# Research {-}

My research is in population biology, mathematical modelling, evolutionary epidemiology, species range shifts, infectious diseases and public health.

For my publications, see [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.ca/citations?hl=en&user=bxt9bh8AAAAJ&view_op=list_works&sortby=pubdate).

When financially possible, our publications are open access. If you can't access a publication, please email me. Below are links to publications that may be more difficult to access. You might also search [MedRxiv](https://www.medrxiv.org/) and [BioRxiv](https://www.biorxiv.org/) for author-typeset copies of the publications.
